tasks.label: Setup: Validate Configuration
tasks.command: echo '=== Validating Hiring Framework Setup ===' && echo '' && ls -la .org 2>/dev/null || echo '✗ .org/ folder missing' && echo '' && ls -la resumes 2>/dev/null || echo '✗ resumes/ folder missing' && echo '' && ls -la evaluations 2>/dev/null || echo '⚠ evaluations/ will be created automatically'

tasks.label: Setup: Create Organization Folder
tasks.command: echo 'To create your org folder, use Copilot Chat:' && echo '' && echo '  "Set up the framework for my organization"' && echo '' && echo 'Or manually: cp -r .org/example .org/mycompany'

tasks.label: Resumes: List Pending
tasks.command: echo '=== Pending Resumes ===' && find resumes -path '*/new/*' -type f 2>/dev/null || echo 'No pending resumes'

tasks.label: Resumes: Create Folders
tasks.command: mkdir -p resumes/developers/new resumes/developers/processed resumes/managers/new resumes/managers/processed && echo '✓ Created resume folders'

tasks.label: Reports: List Evaluations
tasks.command: echo '=== Recent Evaluations ===' && ls -1 evaluations/developers 2>/dev/null | head -10 || echo 'No evaluations yet'

tasks.label: Copilot: Quick Guide
tasks.command: echo '=== Quick Copilot Commands ===' && echo '' && echo 'SETUP:' && echo '  "Set up the framework"' && echo '' && echo 'RESUME EVALUATION:' && echo '  "Evaluate this resume"' && echo '  "Process new resumes"' && echo '' && echo 'INTERVIEW:' && echo '  "Prepare interview for [name]"' && echo '  "Assess interview for [name]"' && echo '' && echo 'REPORTING:' && echo '  "Compare candidates"' && echo '  "Generate batch report"' && echo '' && echo 'Use Ctrl+I or Cmd+I to open Copilot Chat'
